execution_plan.description: Find the IDs of goods that are lemon-flavored cakes.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT id FROM goods WHERE flavor ILIKE 'lemon' AND food ILIKE 'cake';

execution_plan.description: Find receipt numbers that contain the goods identified in step 1 (items.Item is expected to reference goods.id).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get customer IDs from receipts for the receipts found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt) AND CustomerId IS NOT NULL;
